General.Name: Beauce Gold Fields Inc
General.Description: Beauce Gold Fields Inc. operates as a gold exploration company. Its flagship project is the Saint-Simon-Les-Mines gold property comprising 152 claims with total area of approximately 4,808.95 hectares located in Beauce, Quebec. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 2525 East El Segundo Boulevard, El Segundo, CA, United States, 90245
